column1: Reineh (Arabic: الرينة‎; Hebrew: רֵינָה‎) is an Arab town in northern Israel. Located in the Galilee
column2: between Nazareth and Qana of Galilee
column3: it attained local council status in 1968. In 2019 it had a population of 19
column5: the majority of whom are Muslims (70%)

column1: A small spring south of Reineh
column3: was identified in 1878 by Claude Reignier Conder as the location of biblical Cana.

column1: Information on Reina on Palestinian web site
